resources.string: Keeps the app alive in the background for parental control and device monitoring.
You can manage these permissions anytime in Settings
You can adjust these permissions anytime from Settings > Apps > %1$s

To keep running at full strength in the background, this app needs to be excluded from Battery Optimization. 🔋
Tap “Grant” and you’ll be taken to the right screen. Just set this app to no battery restrictions and boom — we stay alive forever. 🚀
(Don’t worry, we won’t eat your battery... just snacks 🍫)

🤚 Heads up! 🖐️
To unlock full background powers, this app needs Accessibility Service permission.
Hit “Grant” and you’ll be teleported to the Accessibility settings. Just flip the switch to allow, and you’re done. 🫡
(No worries, we don’t read your chats or steal your pizza. 🍕 But the parent would. 🤫)

🔔 Heads up!
To monitor app notifications (like messages and alerts), this app needs Notification Access.
Hit “Grant” and you’ll be taken to the settings screen — just enable the toggle for this app. 🫡
To unlock full background powers, this app needs all requested permissions. Please grant them in the next prompt.
Unable to open settings. Please enable manually.

🚀 Some manufacturers block apps from starting automatically.
To make sure we can keep protecting in the background, please enable Auto-Start for this app.
Tap "Grant" to open the right settings screen and toggle us on. 🙌
